attributes.title: Made my phone crash
attributes.review: I tried opening it up and after five minutes it made my phone glitch for about 10 seconds then took me off the app. I tried doing it again and the same exact thing had happened.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app with high hopes of a great user experience. Unfortunately, it took 23 hours to download! attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: No matter how many times restarted my phone the app kept crashing!! After about a week of having it I started noticing my other apps CRASHING as well. This has never, EVER happened to me before. We need to hold president Trump accountable for this abomination of an app and make the app store great again!

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.title: Scared for my Life
attributes.review: I was using this app to support the great and almighty Cheeto when all of a sudden I got a text from someone. So I obviously go check and it says that it was a moderator from the app and they were saying how cute I was because they can see me through my camera! I was very disturbed. DONT GET THIS APP BECAUSE THEY CAN SEE YOU AND HEAR YOUR CONVERSATIONS.
